Episode.summary: Meet Mike and his girlfriend Freda, a descendant from Devil Anse Hatfield, the leader of the Hatfield Clan. The couple lives in the deep woods of Virginia, and fear that the current political tensions and economic unrest will lead to a world war. Next, we follow Mike Adams, in Oregon, who is anticipating a terrorist attack. Finally, we profile Joe, a nonconformist living in the backwoods of Kansas, who has already given up on modern living.
Episode.title: Let Her Rip
